Comments_List: Learned a lot about earth sciences.

Learned about site formations through geologic factors

Read and discussed different research studies

Use of exams to practice oral presentations as well as writing of grants

Research on different geologic influences of sites in antiquity, and use of devices in order to conduct fair and efficient archaeological excavaions
I learned a range of geoarchaeological techniques, gained insights into research design and methods in experimental archaeology, and a acquired a general knowledge of geological processes.
It gives a broad perspective on geoarcaheology.
WE didn't get our grades for any of the assignments so no way to know how we are doing in the class, but otherwise excellent course!
Yes, take it if need to understand what really geoarch is.
Really helps in archaeological excavations of sites

Yes. This course offered a great deal of useful and important knowledge that could directly apply in the field. It also made me aware of laboratory methods that I would like to apply in tandem with the ones that I'm already doing.
